title: Lesson 4: Christ in the OT
description: Seeing Jesus as the fulfillment of the Law and Prophets.

blocks.text: Jesus told His disciples that the entire Old Testament pointed to Him. Whether through the sacrificial system, prophecy, or the wisdom literature, Christ is the ultimate fulfillment of God's promises.
And beginning with Moses and all the Prophets, he interpreted to them in all the Scriptures the things concerning himself.
4.1 - How does understanding that the Old Testament points to Jesus change how you read those older books?
